pkgmetadata.longdescription: Joint Analysis and Imputation of Incomplete Data // Provides joint analysis and imputation of (generalized) linear regression models, (generalized) linear mixed models and parametric survival models with incomplete (covariate) data in the Bayesian framework. The package performs some preprocessing of the data and creates a 'JAGS' model, which will then automatically be passed to 'JAGS' http://mcmc- jags.sourceforge.net with the help of the package 'rjags'. It also provides summary and plotting functions for the output.
